Owlcatz PAID50. aoluain PAIDBITCOIN BLOCK NUMBER:  811,411 811,416  - winner ChiBi Timestamp2023-10-09 22:21811,411 - 0000000000000000000041fa725e61234a050fe220823f9dee128dc24176af 52811,412 - 00000000000000000003e08a94e77ebaf55ef98daf468d110f70d2db4bfc82 84811,413 - 000000000000000000031534c4342b76602f53a9553f83433aba0e141dbd9 97 a811,414 - 00000000000000000002bef8e42a00c2b0f7ba3e5e4c8339086cc6fd442583 90811,415 - 00000000000000000000444c1a0025d2f1492b9a3c96016560da3aa246d70 8 e 4811,416 - 000000000000000000011cac34f6c1b57320c1f8051d6d21190254aa6e72 3 ac 5As the lead artist and part of the magazine team,I'm excited to share this special cover art under MX12art. The team at Magazin TwentyOne inspired and supported me,making these Bitcoin-themed artwork possible. Together, we're on a journey to educateand inspire others about Bitcoin's greatness.Artwork Name:"Lightning Future"Framed Acrylic panel: 45x60cmBackground:Magazine Issue 0: Limited to 2100 hand-numbered copies, this magazine primarily focuses on educating and onboarding new individuals into the Bitcoin world. It's all about orange pilling and embracing a Bitcoin-only philosophy.Magazine Issue 1: Also limited to 2100 copies, this edition introduces the Lightning Network. With DeLorean symbolizing the future, we dive into the possibilities and advancements that await us.Magazine Issue 2: Our favorite, Issue 2, is centered around Proof of Work (PoW). We believe in educating people with facts, showcasing the green and efficient nature of Bitcoin.twentyone.world (https://twentyone.world/):TwentyOne stands as one of the oldest and largest Bitcoin communities. Get insights from our very own Gigi in this video about what TwentyOne represents - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iOWvL9-4k4A&t=13sEach Collector’s Edition is hand-signed and numbered by Mx12.Art and includes certificate of authenticity timestamped on $BTC blockchain.———————Feel Free to visit Mx12.Art Bitcoin Art Threadhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5362071.0———————or———————SALE Threadhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5461355.0

Edit - 15 slots paid for. Just random is fine, spread them out a bit... want to leave others a chance here too, or I would have have done 20 slots.
